snippet: Joe Arpaio, the tough-talking Maricopa County sheriff, is warning civilians who embark on armed patrols in remote desert terrain.
abstract: Maricopa County, Ariz, Sheriff Joe Arpaio is warning civilians who embark on armed border patrols in remote desert terrain that they risk being fired upon by his deputies.
lead_paragraph: Joe Arpaio, the tough-talking Maricopa County sheriff, is warning civilians who embark on armed patrols in remote desert terrain.

headline.main: Arizona: Sheriff Has Pointed Words for Civilian Patrols
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Sheriff Has Pointed Words For Civilian Patrols
